example.name: Target
example.short: The target doesn't fight back. The target is just there. The target is perfect.

Andarada.name: Lion of Sindria
Andarada.short: Don't believe the slander of others, I'm not an impersonator.

Kite.name: Kite
Kite.short: Let me go? Did you lose all your warships?

Wolf.name: Wolf
Wolf.short: Flexibility might be essential for survival, but being a lone wolf is not.

Vangaurd.name: Vanguard
Vangaurd.short: The Vanguard may protect itself, but it won't defend anyone else's peak performance time.

Dominator.name: Dominator
Dominator.short: No one knows why the Dominator appeared at this moment. Perhaps this is Burn Drive.

Enforcer.name: Enforcer
Enforcer.short: It's hard to judge speed among Burn Drive users. It is also hard to say if showing up later to the battlefield is necessarily a bad thing.

Sunder.name: Sunder
Sunder.short: The Sunder always thought itself as the top dog of long range beam attacks, until it met the Executor.

Eacon.name: Eacon
Eacon.short: While mobility is essential for survival, stray bullets are sometimes unavoidable.

NotLastHope.name: NotLastHope
NotLastHope.short: After being left alone last time, Paragon now always takes a frigate along.
